item.title: Language files
item.description: Add translations for the game. There are also defaults to cover most standard pinball messages in addons/PinGodGame/Localization The default example covers English and French in pindog_default_lang.csv. Files YourGame/local BasicGameLang.csv keys,en MY_MSG,Add key values for lanuguages Usage Godot Scripts These can be used in Godot script by using the translation method Tr("EXTRA_BALL") _defaultText = Tr("BONUS_EOB"); Replacing placeholders CSV HI_SCORE_ENTRY,PLAYER %d\r\nENTER NAME,JOUEUR %d\r\nENTRER LE NOM SCRIPT playerMessageLabel.Text = Tr("HI_SCORE_ENTRY").Replace("%d", (CurrentPlayer + 1).ToString());
